label: 袍
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 56th  . Nara National Museum . 2004
説明文: This round-collared courtier's jacket with broad, open sleeves was worn as an outer garment by the aristocracy and priests. The Shōsō-in has over a hundred hō, including white ones for sutra copiers and others for bugaku dancers. [正倉院]
